dict.string: Our app requests access to your camera and photos to allow you to personalize your profile. This feature enables you to take a new profile picture or select an existing photo from your library to be used as a profile picture, banner, or post image. The photos you take or select will be saved on your device and used only within our app. They will not be shared with any other parties.
